mapper.select: select u.*,bus.name AS "beName",bus.subName AS "subName",sr.`id` AS "roleId", sr.`name` AS "roleName",sr.`roleType` from bas_user u , bas_user_role sur, bas_role sr, bas_bus_entity bus where u.`userName` = sur.`userId` AND sur.`roleId` = sr.`id` AND u.beid = sur.beid And sur.beid = sr.beid AND bus.beid = u.beid AND u.userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and u.beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT a.userName as 'id', a.name FROM bas_user a WHERE a.enable = 1 ${sql} and a.beid = #{beid}

SELECT a.userName, a.password, a.name, a.mobile, a.userType, a.email, a.photo, a.professionalTitle, a.executiveLevel, a.loginIp, a.loginDate, a.createUser , a.createDate, a.enable, a.salt, a.token, a.locked, a.beid, b.roleId, c.`name`, c.`roleType` FROM bas_user a JOIN bas_user_role b ON (a.userName = b.userId AND a.`beid` = b.`beid`) JOIN bas_role c ON b.`roleId` = c.`id` WHERE (a.userName = #{loginName} or a.name = #{loginName}) and a.locked = 0 and a.enable=1 and a.beid = #{beid}
